title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {agera5: An R package for downloading and extracting AgERA5 data},   author = {David Brown and Kaue {de Sousa}},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9007},   url = {https://agrdatasci.github.io/agera5/}, }

title: An R package for downloading and extracting AgERA5 data
text: R package agera5 toolbox download extract data “Agrometeorological indicators 1979 present derived reanalysis” dataset (aka AgERA5). https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/cdsapp#!/dataset/10.24381/cds.6c68c9bb?tab=overview download function provides programmatic access Copernicus Climate Data Store download AgERA5 data.

title: An R package for downloading and extracting AgERA5 data
text: agera5 package distribute data, provides access Climate Data Store python cdsapi. specific details license agreenment downloading using data please check license : https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/api/v2/terms/static/licence--use-copernicus-products.pdf

title: An R package for downloading and extracting AgERA5 data
An R package for downloading and extracting AgERA5 data
text: following example downloads daily 2m_temperature data year 2015
code: download_agera5(agera5_var = "2m_temperature",                 agera5_stat = "night_time_minimum",                 day = "all",                 month = "all",                 year = 2015,                 path = "C:/custom_target_folder" )

title: An R package for downloading and extracting AgERA5 data
text: agera5 package relies functionality available open source packages. Python cdsapi https://pypi.org/project/cdsapi/ package reticulate used access Python cdsapi functions R. R package terra used extract data nc files. package fs used efficiently search list files.

title: An R package for downloading and extracting AgERA5 data
text: Please aware still development version package. free use purposes warranty.

what: Downloads AgERA5 data from the Copernicus Climate Change Service - Copernicus Climate Data Store — agera5_download
title: Downloads AgERA5 data from the Copernicus Climate Change Service - Copernicus Climate Data Store — agera5_download
text: data downloaded Copernicus Climate Change Service (C3) using Copernicus Climate Data Store (CDSAPI) Python library https://github.com/ecmwf/cdsapi

title: Downloads AgERA5 data from the Copernicus Climate Change Service - Copernicus Climate Data Store — agera5_download
code: agera5_download(   agera5_var,   agera5_stat = NULL,   day,   month,   year,   time = NULL,   path )

title: Downloads AgERA5 data from the Copernicus Climate Change Service - Copernicus Climate Data Store — agera5_download
text: agera5_var character variable downloaded. See details agera5_stat character Requested statistic selected variable. See details day character Day week requested data. \.codeday = ""  download days requested month month character Month requested. \.codemonth = "" download months requested year. year numeric (Integer) Year download. 1979 - 2020 time Character required variables. See details path Character Target folder local hardrive e.g. "C:/agera5". folder exist beforehand path indicated without ending "/" unzip Logical Downloaded data provided zip files. files uncompressed target path?

title: Downloads AgERA5 data from the Copernicus Climate Change Service - Copernicus Climate Data Store — agera5_download
text: function  provides programmatic access dataset information data license, please visit: https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/api/v2/terms/static/licence--use-copernicus-products.pdf download data valid CDS account CDS API key Allowed combinations variable statistic: cloud_cover 24_hour_mean precipitation_flux solar_radiation_flux 2m_temperature 24_hour_maximum 24_hour_mean 24_hour_minimum day_time_maximum day_time_mean night_time_mean night_time_minimum 2m_relative_humidity 06_00 09_00 12_00 15_00 18_00
